vehicles.title: Select Vehicles
vehicles.description: Select the vehicles you want to add to Home Assistant and set the refresh interval. Note: Viper API has a 5,000 call/year limit.

data_description.refresh_interval: How often to poll for vehicle status updates. Set to 0 to disable automatic polling (recommended to conserve API calls). Status will still refresh after remote start commands.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Viper SmartStart
reauth_confirm.description: Your session has expired. Please enter your password for {username}.

error.no_vehicles: No vehicles found in your account
error.no_vehicles_selected: Please select at least one vehicle
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for details.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: Refresh all vehicle status data immediately.
